Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.gui

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.gui.LoginController
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
Class to manage the GUI for the login. The aim is to show a welcome interface and to get the player's username in order to connect to the server through ClientView.loginQuestion(String)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    LoginController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void gameStart()
    Called when the lobby filled with players and the game is going to start.
    void handleLogin()
    Manages the wrong inputs and sends the login request.
    void initialize()
    Creates a window from file and decorates it and adds a text form and a button to input the player's username.
    void inLobby()
    Called when the user correctly joins a lobby.
    void invalidUsername​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> loggedUsers)
    Method to menage the input of an already taken username.
    void lobbyFull()
    Called if the user attempted to join a full lobby.
    static void setClientView​(ClientView clientView)  
    static void setGui​(GUI gui)
    Assigns gui and clientView(proxy)

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginController

      public LoginController()

  • Method Details

    • setGui

      public static void setGui​(GUI gui)
      Assigns gui and clientView(proxy)
      Parameters:
      gui -

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Creates a window from file and decorates it and adds a text form and a button to input the player's username.

    • setClientView

      public static void setClientView​(ClientView clientView)

    • handleLogin

      public void handleLogin()
      Manages the wrong inputs and sends the login request. After sending the request the form is not available to fill anymore.

    • invalidUsername

      public void invalidUsername​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> loggedUsers)
      Method to menage the input of an already taken username. After the server finds a double of the previously sent username it sends back a list of logged users. This method shows such list.
      Parameters:
      loggedUsers - list of taken username

    • inLobby

      public void inLobby()
      Called when the user correctly joins a lobby. A message is displayed and a ProgressIndicator appears.

    • lobbyFull

      public void lobbyFull()
      Called if the user attempted to join a full lobby. An interactive button to quit appears.

    • gameStart

      public void gameStart()
      Called when the lobby filled with players and the game is going to start. A message is shown and the progress indicator appears again.
